definitions.body: perh. chests of variegated cloth [[בְּרׂמִים]] ´[[ג]] Ez Eze 27:24 so Thes AV RV; Sm Co al. cloths, carpets, Ew Taschen.

treasury (NH [[גֶּנֶז]], Aram. [[גִּנְזׇא]], [[גְּנִיז]], BAram. cstr. pl. [[גִּנְזֵי]]; Pers. loan-word from ganojah treasure? cf. Vullers:ii.1032 Lag:Ges.Abh.27); [[גִּנְזֵי הַמֶּלֶח]] Es 3:9, Es 4:7.
